segments.text: That girl in my econ class . She is so hot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you guys go on a date already ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I didn't even talk to her yet . But I think I'm in love .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think so . I've been following her around campus and I haven't seen another guy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dude , you're a stalker man . Just ask her on a date .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I plan on running into her in the cafeteria when she's alone . I think I'll ask her then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So why do you think you're in love ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She's the only thing I can think of all day long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's called blind love . Well , I gotta run . Tell me how it goes next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Aright . I'll talk to you later .
segments.speaker: S2
